about_the_game:
2223 Giant corporations have perfected a process called 'Transference'
This process allows the consciousness of an individual to be transferred
to a mechanoid host. You are one of these individuals…

Unleash your arsenal of innovative dual arm weapon systems to defeat the robots!
Choose from modules including Blaster, HeatSeeker, T-Beam, Smartgun, Mortar and more!
Upgrade modules for greater damage or fire rate as you progress.
12 Modules are currently available with more coming.

Combine weapons to take apart your enemies in more creative ways!
Hold enemies in place with the T-Beam whilst dismembering with the blaster or attach a mine before throwing them at your enemies. You are only limited by your imagination!

Take on varied mission modes including Wave, Elimination, Race and Survival
Keep things interesting with a variety of challenging mission types. With more mission types under development!

Complete mission challenge objectives and fight your way up the leaderboards
Meet mission objectives such as time limits, damage limits or credits gained to place on live leaderboards. Each mission has it's own leaderboard!

Customise your droid and vehicles
Upgrade both your droids and vehicles stats as well as cosmetics. Unlock and upgrade weapons on cars (bikes coming soon). More vehicles and droid models will be released as the game develops.

name: Recordance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Quad core intel 4th generation processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9 series card with 4gb video ram or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No VR support
  • Additional Notes: This game has been tested on a system with Intel Core i5-4460, 8GB ram and GTX 970 4GB and ran well at low to medium settings but experienced some texture blur. It is therefore recommended to use a graphics card with 8Gb of ram or higher

short_description: THE ROBOTS ARE COMING! Unleash your arsenal of innovative arm mounted weapons and vehicles to defeat the robot hoards. Fight across multiple mission types and environments In this fast paced single player shooter.
